QuestData.Title: Burning Vengeance
QuestData.Description: I am a Blackrock orc by birth. I spent a large part of my youth inside that mountain.$b$b<Ariok motions towards Blackrock Mountain, to the north.>$b$bBut while I share blood with them, I do not share their outlook. And I am seeking an ally to assist me in stopping their upcoming attack.$b$bSo prove yourself. Travel south, to the Whelping Downs, and slay their whelpers and the hatchling black dragons. Prove to me that you're ready for this war.
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay 5 Blackrock Whelpers and 5 Flamescale Broodlings.
QuestData.CompletionText: I suppose you don't have what it takes.$b$bThat's fine. I can fight this war myself.
